title: Girl Meets Rock! UNCUT
description: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, Chihiro Hatono takes the opportunity to buy the guitar of her dreams and fulfill her wish of joining the LMC upon starting high school. This edition includes uncut lyrics from the official release before 29 June 2024 and the scanlated lyrics since then, so English readers can enjoy the full GMR experience.
author: Kuwahali
